content: I am thinking of applying to be a member of a WA state citizens board. They have meeting around the state every other month for 1 1/2 days each time. Can I become a member (non-partisan) and get TAD order (no-cost) for the meetings? The board/commission is for Developmental Disabled Citizens.
reply: I am thinking of applying to be a member of a WA state citizens board. They have meeting around the state every other month for 1 1/2 days each time. title: (No-Cost) TAD orders to perform a government board
